page.title: 11THE OLD RECTORY:Domestic
page.content: The hotel and restaurant is a family business Mr.Percival runs the bar and ordering,Mrs.Percival is the chef and their daughter runs the dining room and organises outside catering contracts. Three full time girls are employed.Mrs Percival considers the hotel a pleasant place to live when running smoothly but it can be very trying to be at their customersÂ£beck and call all day and ni- ght.Residents stay up late.Since moving in the Percivals have had a second sto- rey added to an existing extension to provide 3 extra bedrooms,a bungalow bu- ilt on for their own use,and a conserv- atory built.They have completely refu- rbished the original rectory and garde- ns.Mr Percival wants to add further be- drooms but Mrs Percival wants to retain the family atmosphere.Residents are mainly business people rather than holiday makers.
